content.para: The 3.11.0 release fixes a number of issues and comes with updates of third party libraries.

td.p: Upgrade of Apache Lucene to version 5.3.1.
The DCS could freeze at startup on machines with a high CPU count. We upgraded Jetty and rewrote the thread pool configuration code to handle this issue.
Upgrade of Circles and FoamTree to their newest version.
Removed direct dependency on Apache Mahout (inlined just a subset of required classes).
Minor improvements and tweaks to allow the framework to work in a security manager controlled environment.

content.p: For a complete list of improvements and bug fixes, see JIRA
